titleInfo.title: Can predicate lexicalizations help in named entity disambiguation?

NLP & DBpedia 2015 : Proceedings of the Third NLP & DBpedia Workshop (NLP & DBpedia 2015) co-located with the 14th International Semantic Web Conference 2015 (ISWC 2015) Bethlehem, Pennsylvania, USA, October 11, 2015
